what: Helper Functions for the NIH All Of Us Research Program
title: Helper Functions for the NIH All Of Us Research Program
text: goal nihaou provide functions calculate Social Determinants Health summary scores NIH Us Research Program.

title: Helper Functions for the NIH All Of Us Research Program
text: can install development version nihaou GitHub :

title: Helper Functions for the NIH All Of Us Research Program
text: basic example shows solve common problem, calculating neighborhood disorder score survey data frame:

title: Helper Functions for the NIH All Of Us Research Program
text: survey data frame NIH AllofUs Research Program, can calculate Social Determinants Health summary scores within workspace following functions: calc_cohesion() calc_density() calc_disorder() calc_spa() 4 functions built far, one working test. able calculate scores, need another 17 functions .

title: Calculate neighborhood PANES (Physical Activity Neighborhood Environment Scale) aka Support for Physical Activity (spa) score — calc_spa
code: calc_spa(fake_survey_df) #> # A tibble: 9 × 6 #>   person_id question_concept_id answer            value   spa nrows #>       <dbl>               <dbl> <chr>             <dbl> <dbl> <int> #> 1      1002            40192410 Somewhat disagree     2    18     7 #> 2      1003            40192410 Strongly agree        4    20     7 #> 3      1004            40192410 Strongly disagree     1    11     7 #> 4      1005            40192410 Somewhat agree        3    24     7 #> 5      1006            40192410 Somewhat disagree     2    17     7 #> 6      1007            40192410 Strongly agree        4    18     7 #> 7      1008            40192410 Strongly agree        4    18     7 #> 8      1009            40192410 Strongly disagree     1    11     7 #> 9      1010            40192410 Strongly disagree     1    22     7

title: fake_survey_df — fake_survey_df
text: dataframe fake survey data (generated data-raw) enable testing functions survey data.

title: fake_survey_df — fake_survey_df
text: data frame three variables: person_id numeric id, 1001-1010 question_concept_id one actual 81 survey question concept ids 81 questions Social Determinants Health Survey answer one possible answers, randomly chosen, question_concept_id details SDOH survey NIH AllOfUs, see https://www.researchallofus.org/data-tools/survey-explorer/social-determinants-survey/
